# Param

## Usage
`@param {<type>} <name> - <description>`
 
## Overview
Provides the name, type, and description of a function parameter.

## Example
```javascript
/** 
 * @param {Number} a - first parameter
 */
const myFunc = (a) => {
    
}
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-param.html)**
